title: Looking at existing emails using Thunderbird
content:
• ISSUE/PROBLEM ** 
Configure Thunderbird email client to read same maildir format as Roundcube.  Have 2 email addresses, different accounts, same domain name.


    • TECHNICAL INFORMATION **
  • Platform: hosted VPS with Bluehost
  • OS: CENTOS 7.9 kvm
  • Bootloader: GRUB2, /boot/grub2/
  • IMAP Server: Dovecot
  • MTA: Exim
  • Email address: lee@leelinkoff.com
  • Clients (on VPS server): 
 * Roundcube       =>  /home/leelinko/mail/leelinkoff.com/lee/cur  * Thunderbird     =>  /home/leelinko/mail/cur
creator: leelmobile32

title: Thunderbird Calendar event - data vs visual discrepancy
content: A calendar event is booked at 10:30am. The pop-up window upon mouse-over shows the right time. However, the visual in the weekly view shows the event at 09.30am - why is that? In the picture, the current time line is at about 8:55am.

title: Problema con nuovo thunderbirs e password
content: Ho installato il nuovo thunderbird, (naturalmente disistallando precedentemente il vecchio), Ma all'apertura mi appare ancora quello vecchio e inoltre adesso non mi salva più le password. Nelle impostazioni password ci salvate ma è come se non le leggesse. Ogni volta che lo apro mi richiede nuovamente tutte le password per entrare (ogni volta) e inoltre non trovo più il fleg per il salvataggio delle password (sparito). Qualcuno può aiutarmi?
creator: francesco.martinico1980

title: Thunderbird has stopped connecting on one computer
content: Windows 11 and up to date using three accounts (One Pop3 and two IMAP). My Thunderbird application has suddenly refused to connect on this computer. I have three other computers and devices. They all connect easily. I have checked my log-in details and passwords, and done so comparing a laptops ability to log-in succesessfully and all details agree. I can log-in to my webmail account on all devices using the same details. amd I have updated Thunderbirdrd to the latest version. Nothing seem to work yet. Suggestions if possible would be fantastic please. Thanks. John
creator: jffirth

title: Calendar Stoppe Syncing afetr Windows Restore
content: I did a Windows 11 restore yesterday and now none of my google calendars are syncing. I have tried everything I could find online, even tried the built-in add calendars, deleted all calendars, used provider for google calendar add-on. Nothing. No error message - nothing. I am clueless as to how to fix this and this was something I use every day for many years.
creator: pmruzicka

title: Hello, I have a problem with my account.
content: Hello, I have a problem with my account. When I created my account, I was given the name "541225629" and the password "0600806936". This account is functional and I can open a Webmail box in it. When installing the email application "Mozilla thunderbird", an account zmrzlys@iol.cz was created with the password "up5Date" entered. I will not open a Webmail box for this password. I have been using this account for years without any problems. Recently (probably after an update), however, when starting thunderbird, a password for "zmrzly pop3. Iol.cz" is requested. None of the passwords saved for "iol" are accepted. POP3 responds with [AUTH] Authentication failed. After ignoring this request (X), the mail works. When trying to find a valid password on the website, I received the following answers: "Zmrzly account error - sending the password for the user "zmrzly" was not successful. POP3 iol.cz responds [AUTH] Authentication failed. When trying to log in or create an account at "centrum" - zmrzlys@iol.cz indicates an incorrect e-mail address. When creating a new account "zmrzly" the address is taken. Please help with the solution Thanks to Ing. Simon Zmrzl ýCSc.
creator: zmrzlysimeon

title: How do I hide the online mailbox and folders?
content:
Either as a result of a recent update, or accidentally while troubleshooting another problem, I have changed a setting that affects the appearance of my mail folders.

I am using 128.8.1esr (32-bit) (fully up to date) Thunderbird on Windows 10.

I've attached a screenshot, marking the folders that have recently appeared. I want to get rid of the line "mail.free-online.net" and the INBOX, SENT & DELETED folders. I store all mail locally.

I also notice that my Local Folders message filters are not working. I thuink these two symptoms are related.

There seem to be hundreds of people with Local Folders NOT showing, whereas I have the opposite problem, how to disable the online folders.

Martin
creator: tbird4

title: Unreadable due to missing characters
content: What fresh hell is this (in the image)? The display is like this most of the time. Usually, highlighting text causes that part to be fixed but it doesn't last long. This in on Windows 11 and nothing seems to fix it. I've updated drivers and Thunderbird. I've scanned for system file damage. While there wer some corrupt files, fixing them has not affected the display problem. No effect. It looks like some characters are randomly changed to the background color. AMD integrated graphics on a Ryzen 9 7900x and Asrock X670E PG Lightning mainboard.
creator: pjcamp
